attributes.action: undertake to offer financial support to the Corrus Group to ensure steel production continues in Redcar
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Corrus group have announced huge job losses today in one of our key manufacturing (and exporting) industries.  The government has rightly supported the banking industry to save that industry and investment in production now that can be put into storage can keep this industry 'ticking over' until the economy reoovers.
